EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to Account manager to notify them that the renewal has been approved in stage 1
EmailTemplate.name: Step 1 Complete to AM
EmailTemplate.subject: Approval Step 1 of 3 Complete - {!Opportunity.Account} - {!Opportunity.RecordType} - {!Opportunity.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Opportunity.Account} - {!Opportunity.RecordType} - {!Opportunity.Name}
Thank you for approving the renewal. An email has been sent to the HOC to have their approval, which is step 2 of 3.
